project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would comprise: improvement and extension to existing pumping and treatment facilities at the Walker's Ferry intake station, improvements to the supply main between the intake station and Blantyre, and improvements to the distribution system in the Blantyre area. It would also include the construction of staff housing and workshop buildings, the procurement of vehicles, tools, accounting and other office equipment, and the provision of engineering and management consulting services as well as training.
